attributes.action: Make it necessary to print the place of purchase on alcoholic containers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As in the past refundable bottles were marked with the place of purchase, so that they were returned to the shop. we would require off sales to be marked so that the police can trace easily the shop where under age drinkers are getting their drink. It will also provide a means of tracing litter and the premise warned of its duty of care to sell responsibly to those who recycle their cans and bottles.
